body: Because bioconductor packages does not seem to keep the source archives available for prior versions on their homepage, one will fail to fetch a version of these packages if it is not the latest version. However bioconductor have a git repo for each package and it has a branch for each release of bioconductor (the current release for bioconductor is 3.5). Now changing the url to git will allow one to install the old versions.
title: Bioconductor package url change
